comment: Israel never really was a democracy. The government was formed as a quasi-democratic socialist (Zionist) entity by the leaders of various factions, unions, military, etc -- and for decades leaders have always been selected from that small group: Ben Gurion (from the Hagana/Histadrut), Menachem Begin (from the Irgun), Ariel Sharon (military), etc.

comment: False. The first step in one democracy declaring war on another is to carefully define democracy in such a way that it excludes your opponent.In this instance, you have chosen to define Israel as not a democracy.
